stupidmodel.common
Class SMUtils

java.lang.Object
  stupidmodel.common.SMUtils

public final class SMUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Dedicated class for declaring utility functions that is uninstantiable.

Final class, cannot be extended.

Since:
2.0-beta, 2011

Method Detail

getFreeGridCells

public static <T> java.util.List<repast.simphony.query.space.grid.GridCell<T>> getFreeGridCells(java.util.List<repast.simphony.query.space.grid.GridCell<T>> neighborhood)
Returns a filtered list of GridCell instances from the specified collection which holds no objects.

Parameters:
neighborhood - an arbitrary list of GridCell objects; cannot be null
Returns:
a filtered list of empty GridCell objects, more specifically for which size() returns 0 ; if there is no empty cell in the specified list, an empty list is returned

randomElementOf

public static <T> T randomElementOf(java.util.List<T> list)
Returns a random element of the specified arbitrary list.

Parameters:
list - the list to select a random element from; cannot be null or empty
Returns:
a random element of the specified list using the default random generator of RandomHelper

prob

public static boolean prob(double threshold)
Returns true or false with the specified probability.

Parameters:
threshold - the actual threshold level to use
Returns:
Returns true if a random number chosen from the [0,1) interval is smaller than the parameter; false otherwise
Since:
Model 12

readDataFile

public static java.util.List<CellData> readDataFile(java.lang.String cellDataFileName)
A utility function to read a specified data file that describes the real state of agents to create at the initialization of the simulation.

The method uses the standard Java way to read and parse the input data.

Parameters:
cellDataFileName - the name of the file to open; by default, it is searched in the root of the project directory, cannot be null or empty
Returns:
a properly initialized list containing all of the cell data in the specified file in a structured way; cannot be modified

getGrid

public static repast.simphony.space.grid.Grid<java.lang.Object> getGrid(java.lang.Object o)
Returns a reference to the grid on which the specified agent is located at.

It was a Bug level agent function, but was generalized because in Model 16 we have multiple agent instances requiring this functionality.

Parameters:
o - an object to find in the contexts and return its grid projection; cannot be null
Returns:
the Grid on which the agent is located; cannot be null
Since:
Model 16
